candidates.reason: The comment discusses a specific PCB design and its usage, whereas the topic Altium Designer is about the tool used to create designs. There are no direct overlaps between the topic and the comment.
candidates.comment: This circuit is using a custom designed board to solder the capacitors and resistors to. He used the oscilloscope to show the square wave pattern and first being very choppy, then getting smoother as the camera distance was changed. After focusing the camera, he was able to connect the board to an old tv to get a visual signal. The board does not look to complicated with the capacitors and resistors soldered on it. The heart seems to be in the compact camera with attached boards already on it that are doing most of the signal conversion.
candidates.url: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fcmXG3wB_1M: How to Make Video Transmitter - Make Your Own Television Transmitter
